data.message: Hello, I need help accessing my client's ads account. He sent me countless invitations that I can't seem to receive. W're trying to promote a local event and we're running out of time. Thank you

replies.message:
Hi Chaibia. If something's not working with Facebook ads, or you think there's a bug, you can report it to us. 
http://bit.ly/2gYY21Z. -Tenaya
Facebook I have sent a support message and I still did not hear back. Th event is approaching and we really need to start advertising. Thank you
Hello Facebook. My account was literally disabled by mistake when someone used my account while Im away. My friend did and used it and it may have violate your Facebook terms. Please help me
